description: This file defines the main App component for a React-based web game. It manages theme toggling, screen navigation among Home, Solo, Multiplayer, and Results screens, and performs a health check of the backend API. It imports several internal components and an API function, and uses React hooks for state and effect management.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the game application's UI state, theme, and backend health check.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleGoHome
methods.description: Sets the screen state to show the home screen.

methods.name: handleStartSolo
methods.description: Initializes results state and switches the view to the Solo game screen.

methods.name: handleOpenMultiplayer
methods.description: Initializes results state and switches the view to the Multiplayer screen.

methods.name: handleGameOver
methods.description: Handles the end of a game, storing results and showing the results screen.
